157dcc5b-b952-5719-9cb4-8802a49b4079.title: Document Title: ITP-001-AX-LOT-XXX - WRSB Install - CH XXXXXX - CH XXXXXX

18f98735-8922-579f-a7a3-d06042b1f86f.title: ITP approved for use by: Beakal Likassa

b8ff1536-b555-5ab4-a27f-cfbea2ce0b05.title: ITP Description: Supply & Installation of Wire Rope Safety Barrier

ed474b4e-5adf-5cd0-92e6-4c04a2cf621c.title: Frequency: Min 14 days prior to commencing

1d16d5d1-1cf5-5b08-94b2-6ebeb16d10f8.title: Acceptance Criteria: Only Safety barrier products listed in VicRoads Road Design Note 06-04 shall be used. The installation of the WRSB shall not proceed until the signed statement and certificates of compliance have been accepted by the Superintendent.

4d1eefe6-bb4d-539b-b818-3896aab6c097.title: Reference Documents: Project Specific Specification PS3090.06 (c) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.05

d05e28d1-f142-5e47-ae43-a42e86036d45.title: Record of Conformity: Material Test Certificates

6af57aac-7685-566d-86c0-5d7e43a8334b.title: Reference Documents: VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.04 Cl.711.11

9fbbf422-df48-5313-b71e-f9ff52a20c95.title: Acceptance Criteria: WRSB material shall meet the requirements as specified in VicRoads Section Cl.711.04.

75267d3e-d153-5d35-8b65-eec41b6bb950.title: Record of Conformity: Data Sheets, Visual Inspection

be30d5c0-9b5f-5517-a412-2c84753ab1c6.title: Reference Documents: Project Specific Specification PS3090.07 (b) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.15 (a) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.07(iii)

83c9854f-c1b6-5157-9bb6-f9c65991c42d.title: Record of Conformity: Mix design approval

2c7424a6-091d-58f9-9d09-ba8cd5961f27.title: Acceptance Criteria: Concrete Mix is Registered with VicRoads. Concrete mix meets strength, grade, and maximum aggregate size as detailed on drawings. Where the soil is solid well compacted in situ material as agreed by the Superintendent, the crushed rock can be omitted and a minimum 100 mm depth of N20 strength grade concrete placed for the maintenance strip.

f68a0f32-12cb-5d87-bbad-e880b7ac46fe.title: Reference Documents: Project Drawings / Drawing Register Quality Management Plan

06039c8d-e6bf-5b9e-a25f-d1f5bf2d1b79.title: Acceptance Criteria: Check the revision of the IFC drawings are current as per the drawing register (on Teambinder)

65f21bc5-560e-5cef-91cf-6625a59c1c66.title: Record of Conformity: Latest Revision Drawings

11559784-c542-5058-aa84-88386cea1943.title: Reference Documents: IFC Drawings VR 711.08 VR 711.07 (c)

dd49748c-6d88-5362-969e-218bfc27a60c.title: Acceptance Criteria: Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all Works meet level and location requirements within the tolerances as per cl. 711.08. The WRSB shall not be installed until the set out alignment of the posts has been reviewed and accepted by the Superintendent.

76fefab0-e45a-5114-adcf-1c1eb6d42d6d.title: Acceptance Criteria: Anchor blocks and post foundations shall not be constructed until the design and manufacturer’s acceptance has been reviewed by the Superintendent. Anchor blocks and post foundation shall not be cast until inspected by the Superintendent.

379a8a1f-c0ff-55ec-bd76-4a80c10788b7.title: Record of Conformity: This signed ITP

55c11123-4eb8-5a88-ba31-1b78c85439c0.title: Record of Conformity: This signed ITP

be6ce327-1023-5a1c-b46b-9719934c8c7f.title: Acceptance Criteria: Each wire rope shall be tensioned in accordance with the relationship between rope tension and ambient temperature, applicable to the proprietary WRSB system as per the manufacturer’s specification.

318314a2-e1f9-5472-86b7-648a4f583562.title: Acceptance Criteria: Tolerances for construction of the WRSB system shall be in accordance with the lesser of the manufacturer’s specification or as follows: (a) vertical tolerance on the height of the WRSB shall be ± 20 mm from the design line (b) longitudinal line tolerance for the WRSB system shall be ± 20 mm in plan view (c) tolerance on post spacing shall be ± 25 mm. WRSB height shall be measured from the road pavement when it is located within 1.5 m of the edge of pavement. For distances beyond 1.5 m, the WRSB height shall be measured from the ground surface at its location.

6620dec3-261a-5bd0-8c94-77bce8418c05.title: Reference Documents: WR-STD-064, WR-STD-050 VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.08

a608d665-55db-5ec4-b52b-3a50da77da80.title: Record of Conformity: SCP & Test Report

43113dfe-5eef-5970-9a9a-02ae22a46d7f.title: Acceptance Criteria: Maintenance Strip beneath WRSB and terminals as indicated on drawing and/or as nominated in Table 711.151. The concrete maintenance strip shall be - Placed parallel to the barrier & have min 300 mm clearance to WRSB post. - min 2% crossfall or same slope as abutting pavement - Shall be constructed flush with the adjacent ground level - Shall be min 75mm N20 concrete conforming to the requirements of clause 711.04(b) - Shall rest on min 75 mm of compacted Class 3 crushed rock. Crushed rock may be omitted and substituted for min 100mm depth N20 strength grade concrete subject to Superintendent approval. Dummy joints at least 20 mm deep and 5 mm wide shall be formed at 2 m intervals across the full width of the concrete maintenance strip. Expansion joints shall be placed at intervals not exceeding 12 m.

c11cc395-f67c-5fbb-a45b-2cb374b9c710.title: Reference Documents: Project Specific Specification PS3090.07 (b) VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.15 (a)

3a796207-f4b9-561d-a5e4-57fff77e8383.title: Acceptance Criteria: Survey activities undertaken to ensure and validate that all works meet level and location requirements. The establishment and integrity of the survey network shall be verified before commencing any survey and setout activity. IFC and latest available revision used.

51bc12bc-0479-5209-abae-a5ed7beb8cce.title: Record of Conformity: Survey records & pegs on the ground

cea643ca-8f82-573b-9ba6-22bc754bc37f.title: Reference Documents: Project Spec. Cl.1190.06 Latest IFC Drawings

a2f5f45f-736f-576a-a5ae-1991bfe0c821.title: Acceptance Criteria: Concrete shall be N20 standard strength grade. Sampling and testing of the strength of the concrete shall be carried out. One sample shall be taken for every 50m3 of concrete poured for each strength placed on any one day. Test to include: - 1 x 7 day compressive strength - 2 x 28 day compressive strength - 1 x Slump Test

61fe8c43-6fb2-5995-a670-2ab3041c3291.title: Acceptance Criteria: Concrete shall be cured either by water curing, wet hessian,polyethlyene sheeting adequately sealed against moisture losses, curing compound or combination thereof. Curing compounds to be in accordance with AS3799.

746bb6ae-6ef2-5c94-a1f4-27942fc9e081.title: Frequency: Prior the issue of the Certificate of Practical Completion

4604cd76-3d1b-500b-b676-f1c15aba186c.title: Reference Documents: VicRoads Spec. Cl.711.09 Project Specific Specification PS3090.07(f)

33e21ecd-92a4-5ccc-a6da-e8f15b0b9ff2.title: Acceptance Criteria: Prior to the issue of the Certificate of Practical Completion, FH shall arrange for a safety barrier compliance audit on all WRSB installations constructed under the Contract. A signed copy of the manufacturer’s Installation Checklist / Inspection and Test Plan as per the manufacturer’s Product and Installation Manual shall be completed and submitted to the Superintendent..

c2740ee6-6360-552a-8829-68301672cea2.title: Record of Conformity: Certificate of Compliance for each treatment installed Product and Installation Manual

meta.name: 5.1 - Compliance Audit of Barrier System Installation

fc0bbfd9-8eeb-5f09-9158-b37d42cbdcb5.title: Acceptance Criteria: delineators shall be fastened to the WRSB system, comprising post caps fitted with 50 x 100 mm Class 1A retro-reflective material, as defined in AS/NZS 1906.2, or placed on the front top of the post above the wire ropes. Delineators shall be installed at approximately 12.5 to 15 m spacing. Delineators shall not be placed on flared sections. The delineators shall be arranged so that vehicles approaching from either direction at night will only see: - Red delineators on the left side of one-way and two-way roadways - White delineators on the right side of two-way roadways - yellow delineators on the right side of one- way roadways Delineators not to be installed when the WRSB offset if greater than 4m from the traffic lane.

f3e14268-5c1c-533d-a08d-0b8a7e288eab.title: Frequency: Once installation of assets completed.

74fa82d6-81be-5813-b0d7-70b9e7f314cd.title: Reference Documents: IFC Drawings VicRoads Spec. Cl.703.11

c09aa7c0-c1e3-5fd0-89b8-329d8aa68bea.title: Record of Conformity: Compressive Strength Test Results

613d9fd3-91df-5df4-8a3d-0acffda91c95.title: Acceptance Criteria: 7 day compressive strength to comply with table 610.051 for early indication that the strength is tracking correctly. 28 day compressive strength (average of the 2 no. cylinders) per sample comply with the design strength. Note: 1 of the 2 no. 28 day cylinders per sample may be as low as 90% of the required strength, so long as the average meets the required strength.

d4123d47-88f9-5be0-aa8f-c38271c873fd.title: Acceptance Criteria: Provide record of dimensional measurements to demonstrate concrete members comply with tolerances as per 711.08 as applicable to the element.

e5904829-4fbc-5add-b33f-26d0ef4dc667.title: Acceptance Criteria: Ensure that any NCRs pertaining to the lot / element / Work area that this ITP covers, have been closed in Teambinder.

4235758e-9b3e-5955-b140-95bb453a4c79.title: Acceptance Criteria: A joint inspection of all grassed areas shall be carried out between the Contractor and Superintendent three months after sowing has taken place.
